      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByCallingCode(java.lang.String callingCode)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that have a given calling code This method returns all the countries that have a given calling code Example: 86, 353, 44
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByCapitalCity(java.lang.String capital)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that have a given capital This method returns all the countries that have a given capital Example: London, Paris, Moscow
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByCode(java.lang.String code)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that has the given country code This method returns all the countries that has the given country code Search term must be an ISO 3166-1 2-letter or 3-letter country code Example: COL, IE, GB
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByCodeList(java.lang.String codeList)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that have any of the given country codes This method returns all the countries that have any of the given country codes Search term must ISO 3166-1 2-letter or 3-letter country codes separated by semi-colons Example: col;no;ee
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByCurrency(java.lang.String currency)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that use a given currency This method returns all the countries that have a given currency Search term must an ISO 4217 currency code Example: EUR, USD, JPY
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByFullName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects whose name matches the given name exactly.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByLanguage(java.lang.String lang)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that use a given language This method returns all the countries that have a given language Search term must an ISO 639-1 language code Example: EN, ES, DE
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByName(java.lang.String name)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects whose name matches the given name .
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByRegion(java.lang.String region)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that belong in the given region This method returns all the countries that belong to the given region Example: Example: Africa, Europe, Asia
      static java.util.ArrayList<Country> getCountryByRegionalBloc(java.lang.String bloc)
      Returns an ArrayList of Country objects that belong in the given Regional Bloc This method returns all the countries that belong to the given regional bloc.
